com.manager.device.media

类 MediaManager<T extends PlayerAttribute,I extends MediaManager.OnMediaManagerListener>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.manager.device.media.MediaManager<T,I>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.lib.IFunSDKResult, FishEyeCorrectManager.OnFishEyeCorrectListener, MediaManagerInterface, TalkManager.OnTalkButtonListener
    直接已知子类:
    LocalRecordManager, MonitorManager, RecordManager

    public class MediaManager<T extends PlayerAttribute,I extends MediaManager.OnMediaManagerListener>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MediaManagerInterface, com.lib.IFunSDKResult, FishEyeCorrectManager.OnFishEyeCorrectListener, TalkManager.OnTalkButtonListener
    Created by hws on 2018-05-24.
